column4: hey guys, I've plugged my wireless USB card into my ubuntu computer, but I cant seem to find it anywhere... where can i find hardware and if ubuntu was able to install that hardware?
generally it's found and installed when you plug it in. Can you see a wireless network icon top right?
its not actually a wireless device... it has wireless functionality, but its actually a modem that connects me to the internet
lsusb is a command you can run in a !cli
